duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide direct patient care, perform assessments, and develop and implement a nursing care plan.
Assist with procedures and treatments, administer medications, and monitor patient conditions.
Collaborate with healthcare team members, including physicians and other nurses, to provide optimal patient care.
Document patient data and ensure accurate and timely record-keeping.
Adhere to healthcare regulations and maintain a safe and clean work environment.
Communicate effectively with patients and their families, providing education and support.
